meanings.definition: The state or quality of being important or significant.
meanings.sent1: The importancies of honesty and integrity cannot be overstated.
meanings.sent2: She prioritized the importancies of family and health above all else.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to understand the importancies of nap time and treats.
meanings.sent4: In the garden of life, the importancies bloom like colorful flowers.
meanings.sent5: The teacher emphasized the importancies of hard work and dedication to her students.

meanings.definition: Matters of great significance or importance.
meanings.sent1: The team discussed the importancies of the upcoming project.
meanings.sent2: He always focused on the importancies of time management and efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel gathered nuts with the same importancies as a treasure hunter seeking gold.
meanings.sent4: The stars in the night sky twinkled with the importancies of ancient stories and dreams.
meanings.sent5: The map highlighted the importancies of landmarks for travelers to explore.
